title: Looking for top laner and a jungler to join a team
body: hi i'm Abyssial and i'm the captain for an OCE team for a community, the community name is Tenacity and the team name is Tenacity Blue. to register and apply you have to sign up [here](http://tenacitygaming.com/index.php/forum/) and apply after you've signed up [here](http://tenacitygaming.com/index.php/forums/topic/ranked-team-recruitment/page/4/) we are looking to be a serious ranked 5s team that will also train twice or 3 times a week(depending on players schedules). if you have any questions please feel free to ask. also rank doesn't really matter too much, you just have to know how to play the position well

replies.body: UPDATE: all spots are filled but looking for around 2 people to be subs for the team
Dragzneel i can do both roles but I'm b2 :c. IM NOT BAD THOUGH :D
